MeeGenius: Narrated eBooks for Children

  • UX
  • UI
  • Responsive
  • Mobile

View Live

MeeGenius is an iOS and Android app featuring hundreds of interactive, narrated eBooks for children. Under tight holiday deadlines, I helped the MeeGenius team launch a new version of their responsive website and iOS app featuring their Reading Club subscription service.

I worked closely with the COO/Head of Product, and the UX/Design Lead to rapidly produce high fidelity mockups in Adobe Illustrator. These mockups were handed off to implement the changes for the web and applications.

  • New York Life Insurance
  • Digitas Health LifeBrands
